Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 42nd overall pick, by Boston (UBA) in 1976...
Traded from Boston (UBA) to Boston (FBA) on 3/2/1976 (Going to PIL: RF J. Arias. Going to SHP: P S. Petty)...
Injured on 5/13/1976 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Earned first career win on 5/18/1982...
Had first career hit on 4/14/1983, off Jeffrey Poon (WIS)...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Boston (FBA) in 1985...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
